rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
(Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKF2111, MKP2700} and  Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKF3121, MKW3121} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS})
Unit was previously coded {MKC3130, MKC3134, MKF3131%, MKT313, MKT3131, MKW3440}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MKC3130, MKG3440, MKW3131, MKW3440}

description: Using the case study method this unit provides an analytical framework from which students can explore how marketing strategy is applied throughout a variety of industries. Students will be taught how to analyse, evaluate and implement marketing strategy. A theoretical grounding in introductory marketing, marketing research, buyer behaviour and communications is essential to students undertaking this unit.
